tr.td: Coast Guard wins toss, defers, SLU to receive and defend east goal
Tyler Henning kickoff 61 yards to the SLU04, Leondre Simmon return 31 yards to the SLU35 (Mike Clancy).
Mike Lefflbine pass complete to Colby Johnson for 6 yards to the SLU41, out-of-bounds (Eli Maurer).
Mike Lefflbine pass complete to Colby Johnson for 6 yards to the SLU47 (Kyle Wood).
Jake Gnieser rush for 6 yards to the CGA47 (Joel Wyman).
Jake Gnieser rush for 6 yards to the CGA41 (James Rizzo).
Jake Gnieser rush for 8 yards to the CGA33 (Joel Wyman; Joe Rizzardi).
Jake Gnieser rush for 4 yards to the CGA29 (James Rizzo; Joel Wyman).
Mike Lefflbine rush for 7 yards to the CGA22 (Nick Phillips).
